page.title: 05SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: The block has only one real shopping centre, Stapleford. Bramcote has a small shopping area which caters for mainly small item shopping;whereas the part of Chilwell in this block has almost no shops at all. Though Stapleford has the largest number of shops, residents still prefer to do the main weekly shopping at the new Sainsbury's supermarket in Beeston, or the Co-op supermarket in Toton. Many people complained of the lack of choice when shopping in Stapleford, particularly concerning clothes. Many people also regularly use Ilkeston and Long Eaton as shopping centres. Shopping trips into Nottingham are more rare, whereas Derby is almost totally ignored.
